DOC.brief_summary: Using CFF registry data , analysis : describe pattern time TIS initiation first year TIS eligibility , estimate increase risk death attributable year delay TIS initiation , investigate TIS effect across study center .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Increased Mortality Risk With Each Year Delayed Tobramycin Solution ( TIS ) Initiation , Effect TIS Mortality Across Study Centers
